items.title: Kenshin Himura
items.text:
* Whatever you lose, you'll find it again. But what you throw away you'll never get back 

 * There is no point in rush Analyzing what`s just and what`s unjust …. The greatest unjust became just if it win , that how is the world 

 * Death is the rustle of weakness …. In the end The stronger is the only one who survive  

 * If the right answer can be discovered through fighting one or two battles …. Then we will all be going through life without ever being wrong …. A person`s life isn`t simple matter … the true answer is something you find it yourself from how you live from this day on  



 Anime: Rurouni Kenshin

items.title: King Meruem
items.text:
* In the hands of an incompetent, power brings nothing but ruins. This could only be the works of imbeciles. 

 * Do you humans ever listen to the cries of mercy coming from the pigs and cows you slaughter? 

 * you fight with the resolve to lose i do not understand. you fight for the human race? If so then know that my actions are in fact their benefit. For example, in human society, lands are divided by nation borders, much like territorial markings. On the right side of the boarder, children may starve to death. While on the left, scum who do nothing have everything they need.Absolute madness. I shall crush that madness .. And create a world so fair. The very concept of inequality will be forgotten! I concede that i will initially use power and terror to accomplish my objective. But i will only do so to the extent necessary to maintain order. I have learnt what power is meant to be used for. To protect the weak, who deserve to live. Power is not meant to be used to torment the defeated! 

 komugi are you there? 
 yes , your majesty 
 i'm a little .. tired .. i think i'll sleep for awhile .. do you think you can hold my hand? i'll wake up soon so ... can you stay with me until then? 
 of course , i'll stay with you ... 'FOREVER' 
 This is my favorite scene in anime Ever 



 Anime Hunter x Hunter

items.title: Erwin Smith
items.text:
“If you begin to regret, you’ll dull your future decisions and let others make your choices for you. All that’s left for you then is to die. Nobody can foretell the outcome. Each decision you make holds meaning only by affecting your next decision.” 


 Anime: Attack on Titan

items.title: Edward Elric
items.text:
* “A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s because no one can gain without sacrificing something. But by enduring that pain and overcoming it, he shall obtain a powerful, unmatched heart.” 



 Anime: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood

items.title: Hii-Sama
items.text:
You cannot alter your fate. However, you can rise to meet it. 


 Anime: Princess Mononoke

items.title: Allen Walker
items.text:
When you lose sight of your path, listen for the destination in your heart. 


  Anime: D.Gray Man

items.title: Johan Liebert
items.text:
The big secret to breaking the rules is to make it look as though you’re following them. 


 Anime: Monster

items.title: Chrollo Lucilfer
items.text:
“I am the head, and you are the legs of the spider. Natural law dictates that the legs blindly follow the head. However this simply represents a chain of command. It doesn’t apply to my life of death. If I happen to die, one of you can replace me. And there may come a time when a leg has more importance than the head. Make the right call. My orders are top priority. However, I am not your top priority. Our goal is not to keep an individual alive, but the spider.” 


 Anime: Hunter x Hunter

items.title: Lelouch Lamperouge
items.text:
* The only ones who should kill, are those who are prepared to be killed. 

 * The world cannot be changed with pretty words alone. 



 anime: Code Geass

items.title: Gilgamesh
items.text:
Do exactly as you like. That is the true meaning of pleasure. Pleasure leads to joy and joy leads to happiness. 


 Anime: Fate Zero

items.title: ITACHI UCHIHA
items.text:
* It is not wise to judge others based on your preconceptions and by their appearances. You assume that I am patient, and therefore, you underestimate me.It’s always; “The clan this” or “The clan that.” You all fail to measure your own capacity, and then fail to see the depth of mine. Now you lay before me, defeated. 

  You hold into the organization, your clan, one’s name… But these are thing that limit us and our capacities, and we should detach ourselves from such trivial thing! Also, it is foolish to fear what we’ve yet to see or comprehend! 

  I have lost all hope for this pathetic clan. 

 * Those who forgive themselves, and are able to accept their true nature... They are the strong ones! 

 * People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That's how they define ‘reality’. But what does it mean to be ‘correct’ or ‘true’? Merely vague concepts... Their ‘reality’ may all be a mirage. Can we consider them to simply be living in their own world, shaped by their beliefs? 

 * You focus on the trivial, and lose sight of what is most important, change is impossible in this fog of ignorance. 

 * People's lives don't end when they die. It ends when they lose faith. 



 Anime: Naruto Shippudden

items.title: Griffith
items.text:
* 'While many can pursue their dreams in solitude, other dreams are like great storms blowing hundreds, even thousands of dreams apart in their wake. Dreams breathe life into men and can cage them in suffering. Men live and die by their dreams. But long after they have been abandoned they still smolder deep in men's hearts. Some see nothing more than life and death. They are dead, for they have no dreams.' 

 * 'It is my perception, that a true friend never relies on another's dream. A person with the potential to be my true friend, must be able to find his reason for life without my help. And, he would have to put his heart and soul into protecting his dream. He would never hesitate to fight for his dream, even against me. For me, a true friend is one who stands equal on those terms.' 

 * 'In this world, some people born are like keys that move the world and exist having no connection to the social hierarchy established by man.' 



 Anime: Berserk

items.title: Suzaku Kururugi
items.text:
The best way to remove your lies is to make them come true. 


 Anime: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion

items.title: Fuegoleon Vermillion
items.text:
Being weak is nothing to be ashamed of… Staying weak is!!!  


  Anime: Black Clover

items.title: Oz Vessalius
items.text: “Although I’m weak and full of flaws, I will never stop moving forward. No matter who I am, no one other than myself will create my own existence. No matter what others may think or feel, I will still move forward as myself.” Anime: Pandora Hearts

items.title: Kaori Miyazono
items.text:
“Maybe there’s only a dark road up ahead. But you still have to believe and keep going. Believe that the stars will light your path, even a little bit. Come on, let’s go on a journey!”  


   Anime: Your Lie In April

items.title: hikigaya hachiman
items.text:
Fake people have an image to maintain. Real people just don’t care. 


  Anime: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru

items.title: Tanjiro Kamado
items.text:
“No matter how many people you may lose, you have no choice but to go on living -- no matter how devastating the blows, maybe.” 


 Anime: Demon Slayer

items.title: Rintarou Okabe
items.text:
* “The universe has a beginning, but no end. — Infinity. Stars, too, have their own beginnings, but their own power results in their destruction. — Finite.” 

 * “If you want to grant your own wish, then you should clear your own path to it.” 


 Anime: Steins;Gate

items.title: Sunako Nakahara
items.text:
“I think death is equally terrible for everyone. Young people, old people, the good, the bad; it’s always the same. It’s rather fair in its treatment. There’s no such thing as a particularly terrible death, that’s why it’s frightening.”`


   Anime: The Wallflower Wiki

items.title: Ging Freecss
items.text:
“You should enjoy the little detours to the fullest. Because that’s where you’ll find the things more important than what you want.” 


 Anime: Hunter x Hunter

items.title: Sosuke Aizen
items.text:
* Any betrayal you can see is trivial, what is truly frightening and much more lethal, is the betrayal you cannot see. 

 * Fear is necessary for evolution. The fear that could be destroyed at any moment. 

 * Laws exist only for those who cannot live without clinging to them. 

 * Strong Words Make You Weak 


   Anime: Bleach

items.title: Hisoka
items.text:
* I’m not interested in broken toys. 

 * A true magician never runs out of tricks. 

 * The grim reapers riddles don’t need anyone to answer. 

 * Love and hate are two sides of the same coin. 


 Anime: Hunter x Hunter

items.title: Shoto Todoroki
items.text:
“If you wanna stop this, then stand up! Because I’ve just got one thing to say to you! Never forget who you want to become!” 


 Anime: boku no Hero Academia

items.title: Gold D. Rodger
items.text:
Destiny. Fate. Dreams. These unstoppable ideas are held deep in the heart of man. As long as there are people who seek freedom in this life, these things shall not vanish from the Earth. 


  Anime: One Piece

items.title: Erza Scarlet
items.text:
“Moving on doesn’t mean you forget about things. It just means you have to accept what’s happened and continue living.“ 


 Anime: Fairy Tail

items.title: Sebastian Michaelis
items.text:
“Hatred and Sorrow are power. They are yours to control. All you have to do is to turn them into strength and use that strength to move forward.“ 


 Anime:Black Butler / Kuroshitsuji

items.title: Yugi Muto
items.text:
” If there is the will, then there is hope.” 



 Anime: Yu-Gi-Oh!

items.title: Don Quixote Doflamingo
items.text:
“Those who stand at the top determine what’s wrong and what’s right! This very place is neutral ground! Justice will prevail, you say? But, of course, it will! Whoever wins this war becomes justice!” 


  Anime: One Piece

items.title: Ulquiorra Cifer
items.text:
If there is such a thing like happiness in this world, it should resemble the endless nothingness. Nihility is having nothing and having nothing to lose. If that isn’t happiness… Then what is?  


 Anime: Bleach

items.title: Jellal Fernandes
items.text:
The loneliest people are the kindest. The saddest people smile the brightest. The most damaged people are the wisest. All because they don’t wish to see anyone else suffer the way they did.”  


 Anime: Fairy Tail

items.title: Monkey D. Luffy
items.text:
“Forgetting is like a wound. The wound may heal, but it has already left a scar.” 


 Anime: One Piece

items.title: Light Yagami
items.text:
* You can't ever win if you're always on the defensive. To win, you have to attack! 

 * Humans aren't made perfectly. Everyone lies. Even so... I've been careful not to tell lies that hurt others. 



 Anime: Death Note

items.title: Shiroe
items.text:
“If you can’t do something, then don’t. Focus on what you can do.”  


 Anime: Log Horizon

items.title: L
items.text:
* I have two rules: First, I'm never wrong. Second, if I'm wrong... back to the first rule. 

 * No matter what you do while you're alive, everybody goes to the same place once you die. Death is Equal. 

 * There are many types of monsters in this world. Monsters who will not show themselves and who cause trouble; monsters who abduct children; monsters who devour dreams; monsters who suck blood, and... monsters who always tell lies. Lying monsters are a real nuisance. They are much more cunning than other monsters. They pose as humans even though they have no understanding of the human heart. They eat even though they've never experienced hunger. They study even though they have no interest in academics. They seek friendship even though they do not know how to love. If I were to encounter such a monster, I would likely be eaten by it. Because in truth, I am that monster. 

 * It's not a sense of justice. Figuring out difficult cases is my hobby. If you measured good and evil deeds by current laws, I would be responsible for many crimes. The same way you all like to solve mysteries and riddles, or clear video games more quickly. For me too, it's simply prolonging something I enjoy doing. That's why I only take on cases that pique my interest. It's not justice at all. And if it means being able to clear a case, I don't play fair, I'm a dishonest, cheating human being who hates losing. 



 Anime: Death Note

items.title: Makino Fumito
items.text:
The brighter they shine, the darker the shadow grows. 


 Anime: Hajime no Ippo

items.title: Shikamaru Nara
items.text:
* ''Laziness is the mother of all bad habits. But ultimately she is a mother and we should respect her.'' 

 * I thought I could be a ninja, make some money.. 
  and then marry a woman, who is not so petty and not so ugly. 
  We would have two children. The first is a girl and the next is a boy... 
  When our daughter would have been married and our son could be fully independent, I would retire from my job... 
  I would play shoji or go everyday leisurely, living out the would. And then I would die before my wife... 
 I want to live this kind of life.. 



 Anime: Naruto Shippudden

items.title: Roy Mustang
items.text:
“The world’s not perfect, but it’s there for us trying the best it can. That’s what makes it so damn beautiful.” 



 Anime: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood

items.title: Armin Arlert
items.text:
“People, who can’t throw something important away, can never hope to change anything.” 


  Anime: Shingeki no Kyojin / Attack on Titan

items.title: Vegeta
items.text:
“Push through the pain, giving up hurts more.”  


 Anime: Dragon Ball Z

items.title: Tōshirō Hitsugaya
items.text:
We are all like fireworks. We climb, shine, and always go our separate ways and become further apart. But even if that time comes, let’s not disappear like a firework, and continue to shine forever. 


 Anime: Bleach

items.title: Killua Zoldyck
items.text:
* '' I'm so tired of killing, I just want to be a kid. Hanging out, doing stuff with Gon. That's it '' 


 Anime: Hunter x Hunter

items.title: Saber
items.text:
“There are no regrets. If one can be proud of one’s life, one should not wish for another chance.” 


 Anime:Fate Stay Night

items.title: Orochimaru
items.text:
There probably isn’t any meaning in life. Perhaps you can find something interesting to do while you are alive. Like how you found that flower. Like how I found you. 


  Anime: Naruto

items.title: Gintoki Sakata
items.text:
What is right? What is wrong? In this mixed up world, deciding what is right and wrong is not easy. You can’t just go by somebody else’s rules. If you let yourself be controlled like that, you’ll just become a puppet that can’t make decisions on its own. You have to live by your rules.”  


 Anime: Gintama

items.title: Levi Ackerman
items.text:
“The only thing we’re allowed to do is believe that we won’t regret the choice we made.” 


  Anime: Attack on titan

items.title: Charles ZI Britannia
items.text:
* All men are NOT created equal! Some are born smarter, or more beautiful, or with parents of greater status. Some, by contrast, are born of weak body or mind, or with few, if any, talents. All men are different! Yes, the very existence of man is discriminatory. That’s why there is war, violence and unrest. 


 Anime: Code Geass

items.title: Kurotsuchi Mayuri
items.text:
I hate perfection. To be perfect is to be unable to improve any further. 


 Anime: Bleach:

items.title: Chrono
items.text:
I want…to change things. I want to believe that anything can be changed. The moment I met you, a new world opened up for me. You see, after wandering in the darkness for so long, a light brought me happiness. It’s all thanks to you. 


 Anime: Chrono Crusade

items.title: Reiko Mikami
items.text:
It’s just pathetic to give up on something before you even give it a shot. 


  Anime: Another

items.title: Yato
items.text:
“Life and death are like light and shadow. They’re both always there. But people don’t like thinking about death, so subconsciously, they always look away from it.” 


 Anime: Noragami

items.title: Touko Aozaki
items.text:
“Vision is not what your eyes see, but an image that your brain comprehends.” 



 Anime:The Garden of Sinners / Kara no Kyōkai

items.title: Claire
items.text:
“Don’t be so quick to throw away your life. No matter how disgraceful or embarrassing it may be, you need to keep struggling to find your way out until the very end.” 



 Anime: Claymore

items.title: Roronoa Zoro
items.text:
You need to accept the fact that you’re not the best and have all the will to strive to be better than anyone you face. 


  Anime: One Piece

items.title: Saitama
items.text:
* “Who decides limits? And based on what? You said you worked hard? Well, maybe you need to work a little harder. Is that really the limit of your strength? Could the you of tomorrow beat you today? Instead of giving in, move forward.” 

 * “If you really want to be strong… Stop caring about what your surrounding thinks of you!” 

 “I’ll leave tomorrow’s problems to tomorrow’s me.”  



 Anime: One-Punch Man

items.title: Jiraya
items.text:
“A person grows up when he’s able to overcome hardships. Protection is important, but there are some things that a person must learn on his own. – Jiraiya “ 

 * “A place where someone still thinks about you is a place you can call home.” 



 Anime: Naruto

items.title: Rock Lee
items.text:
“A dropout will beat a genius through hard work.” 



 Anime: Narruto Shippudeen

items.title: Akitaru Obi
items.text:
Having a sense of fear allows you to make cool-headed decisions. Just don't chicken out because of it. 


 Anime: Fire Force

items.title: Houtarou Oreki
items.text:
“I don’t care if no one like me, I wasn’t created in this world to entertain everyone.” 


 Anime: Hyouka

items.title: Gildarts Clive
items.text:
Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger, as well as kinder. 

   Anime: Fairy Tail

items.title: Kyousuke Natsume
items.text:
“Anything can happen. No one ever thinks it will until it does. What will happen, happens. That’s how the world is. The most important thing is to not let the tragedy defeat you. To believe that you can get through it.” 


 Anime: Little Busters!

items.title: Hinata Miyake
items.text:
* “Sometimes, people are just mean. Don’t fight mean with mean. Hold your head high.” 

 * “To act is not necessarily compassion. True compassion sometimes comes from inaction.”  

 * “When you hit the point of no return, that’s the moment it truly becomes a journey. If you can still turn back, it’s not really a journey.”  



 Anime: A Place Further than the Universe

items.title: Jet Black
items.text:
“Everything has a beginning and an end. Life is just a cycle of starts and stops. There are ends we don’t desire, but they’re inevitable, we have to face them. It’s what being human is all about.” 


 Anime: Cowboy Bebop

items.title: Dr. Hiruluk
items.text:
“When do you think people die? When they are shot through the heart by the bullet of a pistol? No. When they are ravaged by an incurable disease? No. When they drink a soup made from a poisonous mushroom? No! It’s when… they are forgotten.” 


 Anime: One Piece

items.title: Pain
items.text:
* Religion, ideology, resources, land, spite, love or just because… No matter how pathetic the reason, it’s enough to start war. War will never cease to exist… reasons can be thought up after the fact… Human nature pursues strife. 

 * If You Don’t Share Someone’s Pain, You Can Never Understand Them. 

 * Those Who Do Not Understand True Pain Can Never Understand True Peace.  



 Anime: Naruto Shippuden
